name: Flappy Fly 3D
description:
UPDATE: Now also available for Android!

The more often you press the Spacebar, the higher you fly! Use the arrowkeys to go left or right! Avoid the pipes! The more pipes you dodge, the more points you win!

All arts and scripts for this game are created by me, Valentin Biktairov.

The music and sound effects was taken from www.partnersinrhyme.com

If you are interested in my games and stuff here are the links you might want to follow:
